content:
My rustdoc PR (#88379) has timed out with its bors merge tests 2 or 3 times. It's just one builder, s390x-linux, that's timing out; all the others finish successfully. It doesn't seem to time out on other PRs. I'm quite baffled as to why this is happening since all my PR does is refactor rustdoc. The builder seems to be timing out while building stage2 rustdoc; it starts building the rustdoc crate at Thu, 07 Oct 2021 01:27:16 GMT and times out at Thu, 07 Oct 2021 03:43:07 GMT.

I would greatly appreciate any help in figuring out why it keeps timing out, so I can fix it and get this PR merged. Thanks!

It seems like s390x is big-endian, so maybe my PR is exposing an endianness edge case in rustc? I think it's probably unlikely that my rustdoc changes are the actual bug here, because the timeout happens while compiling rustdoc, not running it.
Your changes might be triggering another instance of the s390x compilation time regression introduced with the new LLVM pass manager for rustdoc, see #89609.
Ah, thank you! That sounds like it could be it.
